AuthErrors.username_too_short_3: Username must be at least 3 characters
AuthErrors.username_too_long_32: Username must be less than 32 characters
AuthErrors.wrong_password: Password must have at least 10 characters, one number, one special character, both lower and uppercase letters
AuthErrors.wrong_username: Username can only contain numbers, lower and uppercase letters
AuthErrors.user_exists: User with this email address already exists
AuthErrors.not_the_same_passwords: The passwords are not the same
AuthErrors.email_link_error: Email link is invalid or has expired
AuthErrors.token_error: Token has expired or is invalid
AuthErrors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try again in a moment
